data.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you’ve understood all your life, but in a new way.
data.author: Doris Lessing

data.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.
data.author: Dr. Seus

data.quote: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin
